amendment.description: To provide additional funding for the family unification program of the Department of Housing and Urban Development.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1235 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1235 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Portman to Amendment SA 948. (consideration: CR S6311; text: CR S6315) To provide additional funding for the family unification program of the Department of Housing and Urban Development.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1235 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1235 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Portman to Amendment SA 948.
